column5: Hi Everyone,  Just thought I would let everyone know that the last day you can fish for walleye on the Bay of Quinte is March 1st up to until 11:59 pm. This Saturday is it and then you can fish for perch after that. Just thought I would let you know if you are thinking of one last go at it.  Best regards, Sam
Thanks for that info Sam.  Good to know.  Joey
Strange they don't give you the Sunday. They made Zone 11 the Sunday after the third Saturday of March the end of season.
